data.name: addCustomCodeToHeader
data.value: 在HTML头区域添加自定义标签
data.comment: Add custom code to the HTML head section

data.name: areYouSure
data.comment: Are you sure you want to {0} {1}?

data.name: beTheFirstToRate
data.comment: Be the first to rate this post

data.name: blogMLDescription
data.value: BlogEngine.NET 使用 BlogML 作为导出格式. 导入同时支持 BlogML 和 RSS.
data.comment: BlogEngine.NET uses BlogML as the format for exporting. The import supports both BlogML and RSS.

data.name: commentWasSaved
data.value: 评论已经保存，多谢您的反馈。
data.comment: The comment was saved. Thank you for the feedback

data.name: currentlyRated
data.value: 当前评分 {0} , 共有 {1} 人参与

data.name: defaultTextShownInSearchField
data.value: 搜索框显示的默认文字
data.comment: The default text shown in the search textbox

data.name: enableCommentsDescription
data.value: 如果禁用评论,将不能对任何内容发表评论.
data.comment: If comments aren't enabled, nobody can write comments to any post.

data.name: enableHttpCompressionDescription
data.value: 使页面加载更快（推荐）.改变此处将使网站重新启动.
data.comment: Makes the pages load faster (recommended). Changing this will re-start the website.

data.name: enableOpenSearchDescription
data.value: 给新浏览者添加搜索特性（推荐）
data.comment: Adds the search feature to all new browsers (recommended).

data.name: enableSearchHighlightDescription
data.value: 高亮显示页面上的搜索文字
data.comment: Colors the search words on the page.

data.name: enterValidEmail
data.value: 请输入有效的 Email 地址

data.name: home
data.comment: Home（As used for linking to the front-page）

data.name: notifyOnNewComments
data.comment: Notify me when new comments are added

data.name: separateTagsWitComma
data.comment: Separate each tag with a comma

data.name: showCountryChooserDescription
data.value: 如果没有选择显示国家，每个评论旁边将不显示国旗
data.comment: If the country chooser isn't shown, no flag can be shown on each comment.

data.name: showEnableWebsiteInCommentsDescription
data.value: 是否允许评论中显示网站
data.comment: Choose whether to allow Website to be published in Comments

data.name: showDescriptionInPostListForPostsByTagOrCategory
data.value: 以标签或分类列出时仅仅显示文章摘要
data.comment: Only show description of posts when listed by Tag or Category

data.name: trimStylesheetDescription
data.value: 在运行的时候去除样式表中的空白使主题模板文件更小
data.comment: Makes all stylesheets of any theme smaller by removing all whitespace at runtime.

data.name: youAlreadyRated
data.value: 您已经对该文章评过分

data.name: commentWaitingModeration
data.value: 感谢您的反馈，评论正在等待审核。
data.comment: Thank you for the feedback. The comment is now awaiting moderation

data.name: requireSslForMetaWeblogApiDescription
data.value: 强制使用 SSL 与 MetaWeblog API 通讯
data.comment: Enforce the use of SSL when communicating with the MetaWeblog API

data.name: compressWebResourceDescription
data.value: 这可能会破坏第三方功能

data.name: useBlogNameInPageTitles
data.value: 页面标题显示博客名称
data.comment: Use blog name in page titles

data.name: useBlogNameInPageTitlesDescription
data.value: 页面标题中使用博客名称作为前缀
data.comment: Prefixes the page titles with the name of the blog

data.name: filterByApmlDescription
data.value: 输入您站点或者 APML 文档的网址
data.comment: Enter the URL to your website or to your APML document

data.name: useRawHtmlEditor
data.value: 使用原生 HTML 编辑器

data.name: enableCommentNestingDescription
data.value: 只有主题支持嵌套留言时才有用
data.comment: This only works if the theme supports it.

data.name: deleteKeepReplies
data.value: 删除该留言，但保留回复

data.name: ratingHasBeenRegistered
data.value: 您的评分已经被记录，谢谢！
data.comment: Your rating has been registered. Thank you!

data.name: rateThisXStars
data.value: 为 {0} 打 {1} 分, 总共5分

data.name: enableErrorLoggingDescription
data.value: 启用将允许扩展插件、组件等记录可能会发生的任何不可预见的错误
data.comment: Unhandled errors will be logged to any extension/component subscribed to log notifications.

data.name: commentNotificationUnsubscriptionText
data.value: 您注销了此文章的任何新的评论的邮件通知.
data.comment: You have been unsubscribed from email notifications for any future comments to this post.

data.name: commentNotificationUnsubscribe
data.value: 注销此文章的新评论的邮件通知.
data.comment: Unsubscribe from future comment notification emails to this post.

data.name: addToWhiteList
data.value: 添加至白名单,如果至少有
data.comment: Add to white list if at least

data.name: alwaysTrust
data.value: 一旦评论作者经过验证，总是信任。

data.name: authorApproved
data.value: 篇作者发表的审核通过的评论
data.comment: comments of this author have been approved

data.name: authorBlocked
data.value: 如果评论被删除，则总是阻止其作者。
data.comment: If comment was deleted, always block author

data.name: authorRejected
data.value: 篇作者发表的审核未通过的评论
data.comment: comments of this author have been rejected

data.name: commentsApprovedByAdmin
data.value: 手动处理 - 只有当评论被管理员批准通过之后才会显示
data.comment: Manual - only after comment approved by admin will it show up in the blog

data.name: commentsAuto
data.value: 自动处理 - 规则和过滤器（需设定）将自动判断评论是否为垃圾评论
data.comment: Automatic - rules and filters will decide if comment is spam

data.name: commentsBlacklist
data.value: 添加至黑名单,如果至少有
data.comment: Add to black list if at least

data.name: commentsUnmodApproved
data.value: 如果不作处理，所有评论将默认为批准通过状态
data.comment: If not moderated, all comments approved by default

data.name: confirmResetCounters
data.value: 您确定要重设所有计数器为`0`吗？
data.comment: Are you sure you want to reset all counters to `0`?

data.name: trustAuthenticated
data.value: 信任已通过验证的评论作者

data.name: addToPages
data.value: 添加到页面 (增加到文章中)
data.comment: Add to pages (in addition to posts)

data.name: deleteConfirm
data.value: 您确定要删除这条评论吗?
data.comment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

data.name: developmentModeCheckboxMessage
data.value: 如果您在本地测试 disqus 的话, 请勾选
data.comment: Check this when you test disqus locally

data.name: disqusSignupMessage
data.value:
要使用 Disqus 评论系统的话, 需要先在 disqus.com
注册, 将获得的短名填入配置项中(站点短名在基础配置中).
data.comment:
To use Disqus as your comment manager you need first set up account at disqus.com
Short name used to uniquely identify your website on Disqus (Website shortname in Basic Settings).

data.name: passwordChangeSuccess
data.comment: Your password has been changed successfully.

data.name: passwordRetrievalInstructionMessage
data.value: 输入您的 Email 地址, 您将立刻收到找回密码的邮件.
data.comment: Type your email address in the field above and your password will be emailed to you shortly.

data.name: requiredPasswordLength
data.value: 新密码至少需要 {0} 个字符.
data.comment: New passwords are required to be a minimum of {0} characters in length.

data.name: siteUnavailableConfirm
data.value: 站点将暂停数秒, 确定要继续吗?
data.comment: The website will be unavailable for a few seconds.\nAre you sure you wish to continue?

data.name: areYouSureDeleteRow
data.comment: Are you sure you want to delete this row?

data.name: enterValidDate
data.value: 请输入有效的日期 (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm)
data.comment: Please enter a valid date (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm)

data.name: enterValidNumberPositiveNegative
data.value: 请指定一个有效数 (正数或负数)
data.comment: Please specify a valid number (positive or negative)

data.name: onlyLoggedInCanView
data.value: 必须登录才能查看文章 (私密博客)
data.comment: Only logged in users can view posts (private blog)

data.name: specifyPingService
data.value: 请指定一个 Ping 服务

data.name: trackingScriptDescription
data.value:
您可以在这里放置统计代码等 JavaScript 代码.

这些代码将被加入到每个页面的最底部而不管您使用的是何种主题模板.

(需添加 <script> 标记)
data.comment:
Visitor tracking script

The JavaScript code from i.e. Google Analytics.

Will be added in the bottom of each page regardless of the theme.

(remember to add the <script> tags)

data.name: notifiedPublished
data.value: 当有新文章发表时通知我.
data.comment: Get notified when a new post is published.

data.name: pendingApproval
data.comment: Comments will be pending administrator's approval

data.name: Referrers_BindTable_Total
data.comment: Footer row text of first cell

data.name: allowRemoteFileDownloadsDescription
data.value: 允许服务器处理来自其他站点的下载、缓存、程序资源.
data.comment: Allow the server's handlers to download/cache/process resources from other websites.

data.name: remoteTimeoutDescription
data.value: 服务器下载远程资源的最大时间限制（毫秒）. 不限请设定位 0. 默认值 30000.
data.comment: The maximum length of time(milliseconds) the server can spend downloading a remote resource. Set to 0 for unlimited. Default is 30000.

data.name: maximumRemoteFileSizeDescription
data.value: 服务器下载远程文件的最大尺寸（字节）. 不限请设定位 0.
data.comment: The maximum size in bytes of a remote file the server can download. Set to 0 for unlimited.

data.name: recaptchaConfigureReminder
data.value: 请确保 Recaptcha 插件已被启用并配置完整.
data.comment: Make sure the Recaptcha extension is enabled and properly configured.

data.name: whitelistIpOnCommentApproval
data.value: 自动将审核通过的评论IP地址加入白名单.
data.comment: Automatically add IP Address of Comments you Approve to the white list.

data.name: blacklistIpOnCommentRejection
data.value: 自动将拒绝通过的评论IP地址加入黑名单.
data.comment: Automatically add IP Address of Comments you Reject to the black list.

data.name: minPassLengthInChars
data.value: 密码至少要包含 {0} 个字符

data.name: newAndConfirmPasswordMismatch
data.value: 新密码与密码确认不一致
data.comment: New and confirm passwords do not match

data.name: passwordAndConfirmPasswordMismatch
data.value: 密码与密码确认不一致
data.comment: Password and confirm password do not match

data.name: passwordAndConfirmPasswordIsMatch
data.value: 新密码与密码确认不一致
data.comment: New and confirm passwords do not match

data.name: youDontHaveAnyDraftPages
data.comment: You don't have any draft pages.

data.name: youDontHaveAnyDraftPosts
data.comment: You don't have any draft posts.

data.name: doNotPassRightsWithFalseValue
data.comment: Do not pass back rights that have false values.

data.name: rightsCanNotBeNull
data.comment: Rights Collection argument can not be null.

data.name: rightsUpdatedForRole
data.value: 角色 "{0}" 的权限已更新

data.name: roleNameIsRequired
data.comment: Role name is a required field.

data.name: userWithEmailExists
data.value: 此邮件地址的用户已存在
data.comment: User with this email already exists

data.name: uploadVideo
data.value: 选择您要上传的视频文件 (MP4, WMV, FLV, OGG, WebM) or audio (MP3)
data.comment: Choose video (MP4, WMV, FLV, OGG, WebM) or audio (MP3) file you wish to upload

data.name: turnDisqusOnOff
data.value: 启用或禁用 Disqus 服务

data.name: useDisqusAsCommentProvider
data.value: 使用 Disqus 提供的评论服务
data.comment: Use Disqus as a comment provider

data.name: exportIntoBlogML
data.value: 将您的博客数据导出成 XML 文件 (BlogML)
data.comment: Export your blog's content into XML file (BlogML)

data.name: runClickOnceApplicationToImport
data.value: 运行 BlogML 或 RSS 一键导入程序，为博客导入数据. 仅支持 IE 浏览器.
data.comment: Run click-once application to import content saved as BlogML or RSS 2.0 into your blog. Internet Explorer only.

data.name: selectSavedBlogMlFle
data.value: 选择 BlogML 文件并导入到当前博客. 支持任何浏览器，但仅支持 BlogML 格式文件.
data.comment: Select saved BlogML file and import it into your blog. Any browser, BlogML only.

data.name: cannotDeleteLastAdmin
data.value: 无法删除最后一位拥有创建、编辑用户权限的用户. 请在删除该用户前把这些权限授予其他用户.
data.comment: You cannot delete the last user with rights to create or edit users. Grant these rights to another user first before deleting this user.

data.name: areYouSureDeleteComment
data.value: 您确定要删除这条评论吗?

data.name: areYouSureDeletePage
data.value: 您确定要删除这个页面吗?

data.name: existingBlogToCreateNewBlogFrom
data.value: 从现有博客创建新博客

data.name: acceptAnyTextBeforeHostname
data.value: 主机名前允许任意字符(泛解析)

data.name: enterEmailAddress
data.value: 请输入您的 e-mail 地址

data.name: commentsAddedSince
data.value: 您在 {0} 的最后一条评论之后有新的评论.

data.name: writtenCommentsTotal
data.value: 您在这里总共发表了 {0} 条评论.
